name: Gdrive Uploader
description: Telegram/Direct Links to Gdrive Uploader Bot

ENV.description: Set it to anything to enable configuration by environment variables.

APP_ID.description: Your API_ID, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Your API_HASH, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

SUDO_USERS.description: List of sudo users ids, seperated by space.

SUPPORT_CHAT_LINK.description: Support Chat link in valid url format.

DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: Custom path for downloads. Must end with a forward slash.

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google Drive Client ID from Google Cloud Platform

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google Drive Client Secret from Google Cloud Platform
